SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class TEST09_US020401_EventPosterUploadUITest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.TEST09_US020401_EventPosterUploadUITest
public class TEST09_US020401_EventPosterUploadUITest extends Object
UI tests for US 02.04.01: As an organizer I want to upload an event poster to the event details page to provide visual information to entrants. These tests validate that:
  • Poster upload button is visible and clickable
  • Image picker can be opened
  • Selected image is displayed in the poster view
  • Poster upload is optional (event can be created without poster)
  • Poster is saved when event is created
Note: For reliable Espresso testing, disable animations on the device/emulator: 
 adb shell settings put global window_animation_scale 0
 adb shell settings put global transition_animation_scale 0
 adb shell settings put global animator_duration_scale 0
